padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402522">Helloneighbor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooo this is good.  Up on the spray on the tester strip it opens up to me exactly like santal basmati even though none of the notes are similar.  Being intrigued, I sprayed on skin and this is so nice. It’s fruity yet woody and even though it’s in the same vein as the normal scent profiles I lean towards, it somehow is still super different.  It’s slightly tangy from the raspberry but still has a soft woody powderiness. <br />
<br />
I thought I was done buying perfume this year but I may pick this up if i hit a certain milestone at work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2279457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2279457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stefavramoglou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stefavramoglou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073">stefavramoglou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A more affordable arguably better Straight to heaven. You get double the quantity for 50 euros less, without compromising a lot on the quality.. One of the most long lasting Penhaligon's scents I've ever tested, about 12 hours, but it wasn't really radiating off my skin.<br />
<br />
The name is very appropriate for the scent and is not misleading at all. Warm woods, nice whiskey accord, and a drenched in booze patchouli, almost identical to StH by Kilian<br />
<br />
If you are a fan of the scent profile, it's a fantastic offering from the posh brand, and quite unique when compared to the rest of the brand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2272063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2272063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271432" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumedbythesea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2208688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumedbythesea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barénia"title="Barénia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208688">Perfumedbythesea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve loved wearing this sample today. I feel it is a more refined, less cloying Jazz Clue style boozy  scent. <br />
(I adore Jazz Club!)<br />
I would be happy to spray this during the heat whereas I would keep away from JC!!<br />
Yes this chills down to more of a subtle scent. But I keep getting whiffs of it even 8 hours later. <br />
I can imagine on clothes this would linger. <br />
I would be happy to wear this on a special night out or even just as a coffee shop date. <br />
I think this is the best of the past few Penhaligon’s releases. (Although I liked them esp Solstice) this has something more unique more interesting to it. <br />
I will be getting a bottle of this when my sample runs out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2271432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2271432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Really weak... agreeing with the reviews below that it very quickly becomes a skin scent ! And not even a great smell anyway.... quite powdery to me<br />
<br />
And there's indeed a slight similarity to Kilian’s Straight to Heaven and Jazz Club</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2270218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2270218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268559" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DivideDG3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DivideDG3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959050">DivideDG3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 18:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample of this off of their webpage. Upon the inital spray I do get some of the raspberry, but it almost immediately vanishes into a sort of mixed berry/fruity accord, which was slightly disappointing. One thing I noticed was how quickly it became a skin scent for me. It felt like I could smell it projecting for about an hour before it died down, which was pretty unfortunate. If you like a pretty realistic boozy fragrance that is reminiscent of a fresh body wash, this is a good pickup. Not for me though unfortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2268559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2268559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264515" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kingofclubs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1822609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kingofclubs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Under-The-Lemon-Tree-53379.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53379.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Under The Lemon Tree"title="Under The Lemon Tree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822609">Kingofclubs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 03:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first trying this fragrance in Penhaligins Liverpool, my first thought was MM Jazz Club. There's more than a passing resemblance; with the art deco packaging and the themeing of the fragrance including the lines "toes start tap tapping" "endless nights" "another whisky from the barrel" they may as well have just written "inspired by Jazz Club"<br />
It's a nice fragrance, raspberry the on-trend note of the moment, it doesn't lean particularly masculine or femine to me.<br />
I also sampled Dior Savage Eau forte and Pen's terrible Teddy and this is the one I plumped for on price vs performance.<br />
It is still detectable (tho not projecting) some 18 hours later. It's nice but not special and it isn't very original.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2264515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2264515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263885" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShooF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShooF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althaïr"title="Althaïr"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896239">ShooF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well what to say about The Dandy, what a let down! Went into Penhaligons in Glasgow &amp; the kind assistant applied 2 sprays to my wrist, so it's an immediate "Oh I like this....." not picking up any raspberry though but 5 mins later I'm struggling to pick up anything, it's gone! This very very quickly became a skin scent &amp; very much reminds me Bacio Immortale by Argos although in that case it's cheaper &amp; IMO &amp; much better scent. This is very much a very watered down Ombre Leather &amp; if this is a scent profile that you love buy either Bacio or Ombre, you'll be much happier in the long run.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260343" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babe_esque"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="babe_esque" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103924">babe_esque</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this fragrance. It smells lovely. I love the boozy whisky smell with the touch of raspberry when spraying. However it is very intimate, sits flush to the skin with hardly any sillage. In terms of longevity, the fragrance lasted 30 mins before it disappeared without trace. I prefer a fragrance that makes a statement so was really disappointed with it and the longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2260343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2260343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Is giving me same vibes like Baraonda from Nasomatto. Longevity is lacking with a moderate silage. <br />
Lasts a decent amount of time on the skin ( 4-5h ) .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2260149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2260149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="West38"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="West38" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Cashmere-Musk-95908.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95908.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cashmere Musk"title="Cashmere Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); It’s nice and it’s unique…. but I don’t know if I’d want to wear it a lot! It’s a good evening winter scent but definitely no everyone’s cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2258476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2258476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255953" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seuni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seuni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523">Seuni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 03:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like you’ve given an AI Gualtieri’s creations and asked it to make a light and airy version of all the common ingredients combined. Just get a Terroni, Boccanera or even Black Afgano. Cheaper, way more performance, way more character. Such a disappointing release, just a bunch of sweet woods made commercial with moderate performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2255953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2255953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252988" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="parispeach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/500472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="parispeach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Manhattan-Eau-de-Parfum-77295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Manhattan Eau de Parfum"title="Manhattan Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/500472">parispeach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 02:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really nice boozy scent. It’s literally Straight to Heaven with Halfeti Cedar and a fruity raspberry. The performance unfortunately isn’t great. The scent itself is lovely, I’m really loving how it smells, but it’s too light and doesn’t project off the skin much. I think they missed a trick here by not adding enough weight to the scent. I purchased a day ago and I’ve already made a dent in it from overspraying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2252988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2252988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="velb95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.44454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="velb95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regalien/Sah-69366.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69366.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sah"title="Sah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44454">velb95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 01:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>EN. Unfortunately, Penhaligon’s “The Dandy” doesn’t live up to the expectations set by its price tag or niche branding. While some users find its woody notes layered and complex, I struggle to identify the nuanced, luxurious elements others describe. The dominant woody undertone, though not unpleasant, lacks the sophistication or depth one would anticipate from a fragrance costing €240. It simply doesn’t convey the exclusivity or refined character that I expect from a niche perfume.<br />
<br />
IT. Purtroppo, “The Dandy” di Penhaligon’s non è all’altezza delle aspettative dettate dal suo prezzo o dalla sua fama di profumo di nicchia. Mentre alcuni utenti percepiscono note legnose complesse e sfumate, fatico a identificare gli elementi lussuosi e sofisticati descritti da altri. La nota legnosa dominante, seppur non sgradevole, manca della raffinatezza o profondità che ci si aspetterebbe da un profumo dal costo di €240. Semplicemente, non trasmette l’esclusività o il carattere raffinato che mi aspetto da un profumo di nicchia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2250953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2250953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EiSei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1572737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1572737.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EiSei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1572737">EiSei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If Bentley for Men Intense &amp; Ébène Fumé had an unholy bastard child, this would be it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2235819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2235819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The patchouli accord used in Penhaligon's fragrance is like no other. This is absolutely gorgeous with the whiskey and fruity top notes. My husband and I both like it, although this seems to me like a toned down version of Constantinople and I'm trying to keep my collection small. The ambery base used in Penhaligon’s male perfumes is very familiar to me, this also smells low-key like a muted Mr. Sam.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2227314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2227314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226676" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 00:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does the whiskey accord really well. Would be a pickup for a good price. <br />
<br />
As soon as you spray, I get this very nice 'whiskey with ice' smell. I don't get the citron and raspberry much at the start as much as I'd like. I was under the impression that it would be the smack of citrus followed by the whiskey, but I mostly get whiskey. However, this doesn't smell like angel's share and smells like a photo-realistic whiskey smell. I do actually get a halfeti backbone to it, that patchouli-esque smell with something else. If you sprayed halfeti on one hand and this on another you would see what I'm talking about. This really is quite linear, but if you're looking to smell like refined whiskey, this is one to pick up. <br />
<br />
I believe this is part of the 'British Tales' line. Others in this line are the typical scents such as Sartorial. However, the latest limited edition fragrances such as Sports Car Club and Brilliantly British, this stands head on shoulders above those. <br />
<br />
Projection and longevity isn't amazing, but it's acceptable. Penhaligons have never been particularly amazing at that department though. <br />
<br />
4/5 for me. It's probably one of penhaligons better scents in recent times, but a shame they missed out on the fruit/citrus notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2226676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2226676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220117" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JHW1987"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195534.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JHW1987" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); A touch sweeter due to the raspberry note. It’s nice but it’s nothing new which is a shame</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2220117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2220117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pronose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/458332"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.458332.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pronose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roger-Gallet/Cedrat-3483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cédrat"title="Cédrat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/458332">pronose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice release by PENHALIGON'S 👍 a very unusual scent 👌 perfect for the fall 🍁 just love it ❤️😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2217433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2217433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216189" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LordCharfield"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/583881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.583881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LordCharfield" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/583881">LordCharfield</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 04:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got a sample with a purchase from Penhaligons.<br />
Beautiful, unusual, nutmeg and booze…..nothing like Bentley Intense as some have suggested in the “smells like” section.<br />
This is straight on my list, love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2216189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2216189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215060" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraVTerrazas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraVTerrazas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ramon-Monegal/lovereaction-98446.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98446.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="#lovereaction"title="#lovereaction"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949">LauraVTerrazas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 04:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ohhh this is gorgeous! Just received a sample of this and it immediately made it onto my wishlist. <br />
It's a casually elegant fragrance. <br />
I'll admit that Penhaligon's recent solo launches have been a bit of a miss for me but this one is finally a winner.<br />
<br />
 Its a woody/patchouli dry down and the opening is very liquor and citrus forward with a bit of a spicy/cinnamon feel (think winter spices). The opening doesn't last very long. The patchouli in this is similar to that of Tempo from Diptyque. <br />
I think this is unisex leaning traditionally masculine but unisex nonetheless. <br />
This is not a super loud fragrance, which I personally appreciate. So that's something to keep in mind if performance is your #1 priority. By no means is it a skin scent though. <br />
<br />
I think I finally found *my* perfect woody/patchouli perfume! 🙌<br />
<br />
But... I will keep testing it just to be sure 😄<br />
<br />
Edit: the longer it sits on my skin, the more I'm loving it. At times I'm getting Tempo from Diptyque and at times I'm getting a soft Santal Blush (maybe even EL Sensuous). Definitely loving this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2215060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2215060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213719" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BGBG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BGBG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Visit-For-Men-598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Visit For Men"title="Visit For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213719ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213719" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277">BGBG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can't wait to try it. And if it is in the vein of Straight to Heaven which is one of my absolute favourite fragrances, it should be a banger.<br />
<br />
Finally I could try it. It is very nice indeed and is a mix between STH and something with a lot of sandalwood like TF Santal Blush or Santal 33. But I do prefer STH very much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2213719"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2213719#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SomaNyx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1600755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SomaNyx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pantheon-Roma/Anniversario-61609.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61609.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Anniversario"title="Anniversario"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600755">SomaNyx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 14:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As per the previous comment. Wtf with the low ratings on a brand new launch. Proper weird</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2213324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2213324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213109" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume_madness"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266104.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume_madness" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Lipstick-Fever-60868.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60868.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lipstick Fever"title="Lipstick Fever"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266104">Perfume_madness</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 11:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why does this have hate already? I swear people are so stupid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2213109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2213109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuspendedInJicky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503108"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503108.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuspendedInJicky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503108">SuspendedInJicky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is quite a nice masculine. It has facets that remind me of Halfeti even though it isn't similar. There's something a little buttery and salty in the opening, like shortbread served with whisky (Coal Ila, for sure.) The citrus/raspberry notes aren't that apparent to me as there's an abundance of woods drowning those out. The woods have a slightly rubbery/smokey quality but this registers quite low in the main body of the scent and subtly compliments the composition.<br />
<br />
The Dandy lasts a decent amount of time on the skin and has moderate silage which I think suits the composition well; if it were too strong it would risk being brash and overbearing, like a Tom Ford, and that just isn't the way of The Dandy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2212900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2212900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2212900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuspendedInJicky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503108"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503108.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuspendedInJicky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503108">SuspendedInJicky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is quite a nice masculine. It has facets that remind me of Halfeti even though it isn't similar. There's something a little buttery and salty in the opening, like shortbread served with whisky (Coal Ila, for sure.) The citrus/raspberry notes aren't that apparent to me as there's an abundance of woods drowning those out. The woods have a slightly rubbery/smokey quality but this registers quite low in the main body of the scent and subtly compliments the composition.<br />
<br />
The Dandy lasts a decent amount of time on the skin and has moderate silage which I think suits the composition well; if it were too strong it would risk being brash and overbearing, like a Tom Ford, and that just isn't the way of The Dandy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2212900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2212900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294502" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294502ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294502" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 06:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't get the negativity with this at all. This should be over a 4.00 rating on here, I know 3.82 (at time of writing) isn't exactly low, but this stuff is great considering the price per ml compared to other Penhaligon's fragrances.<br />
<br />
Opens very boozy, woody and a little earthy. Dries down with the same nuances but the woody earthiness takes the foreground with the booziness poking its head through, but you can definitely still pick it up easily. It's classy and masculine, the name is very fitting!<br />
<br />
On me, the projection and longevity are moderate. By that, I mean it lasts well enough and projects well enough, it's not an in your face fragrance by any means, but it is certain not poor in either of those two fields. It's well put together, very nice quality, and worth picking up for sure. If you do get it, I cross my fingers for you that you don't have the poor longevity and sillage that some people apparently get, if you believe those reviews.<br />
<br />
The comparisons with Straight To Heaven are justified, by the way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95396"comment_id="2294502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Dandy-95396.html?ccid=2294502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EiSei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1572737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1572737.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EiSei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);
